trans-unit.source: Backend Log In: Enable Auth0 login for TYPO3 backend
Application: Application identifier for backend login
Reactivate Disabled Users: Allow log in for disabled backend users
Reactivate Deleted Users: Allow log in for deleted backend users
Soft Log Out: Logout from TYPO3 only (not from Auth0)
Additional Query Parameters: Additional query parameters for backend authentication (e.g. "access_type=offline&connection=google-oauth2")
Frontend Log In: Enable Auth0 log in for TYPO3 frontend
Storage Page: Storage page for frontend user
Reactivate Disabled Users: Allow log in for disabled frontend users
Reactivate Deleted Users: Allow log in for deleted frontend users

Generic Callback: A generic callback URI for all requests (frontend and backend) will be used. The callback URI will be https://www.example.com/auth0/callback. Please note, that this configuration will become default in future releases.

Private Key File: The absolute path to your private key file on your server. If set, this key will be used for signing the generated tokens. Otherwise, TYPO3's encryption key will be used. Only RSA keys are supported for now.
Public Key File: The absolute path to your public key file on your server.
